tvt.label: Team vs Team
tvt.description: Join forces and battle for glory in the grand arena.

ctf.label: Capture the Flag
ctf.description: Capture the enemy flag and defend your base.

siege.label: Castle Siege
siege.description: Massive battles where clans fight for castle dominance and taxes.

territory.label: Territory War
territory.description: Defend your region's wards and earn special badges.

olympiad.label: Grand Olympiad
olympiad.description: Compete in 1vs1 battles to achieve Hero status and wield legendary weapons.
